name: com.rlabrecque.steamworks.net
description:
Steamworks.NET is a C# Wrapper for Valve's Steamworks API.

Created by Riley Labrecque

samples.description: A lite open source variant of Heathen Engineering's Steamworks Unity integration including a simple Spacewar (480) example.
An example built on app id 480 (Spacewar) which demonstrates basic funcitons of the Steam API
